attributes.action: Lower the age of Cervical Screenings (smear test) from 25 to 16.
attributes.additional_details: Many women have symptoms from younger than the age of 25, and have to push to get a smear test done, and even still not getting one. This needs changed as it could save a lot of lives.
attributes.background: I would like the age for smear tests to be lowered to 16 instead of waiting until your 25 to have one.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Offer the smear test to over-16s
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574513
